job-application.title: Job Application Readiness Calculator
job-application.subtitle: Assess Your Job Application, Free Game!
job-application.description: Imagine you are applying for your dream job.
job-application.headline: Will You Get the Job? – Estimate The Probability w/ This Free Game!
job-application.instructions: ① Review these “job readiness conditions” that indicate your application is likely to succeed. ② Click the red squares to check them off. You want the whole board to turn green. You'll learn effective job application strategies. ③ READ CAREFULLY & be honest.
